external_games.name: VRC PRO Welkom Arena Lay-out 3-4-5-6 track pack (4)

name: VRC Pro: Welkom Arena Lay-out 3-4-5-6 Track Pack 4
summary: The Welkom Arena, home of the 2018 IFMAR Worlds 1:10 and 1:12 electric. Located in Welkom South Africa, the Welkom Arena is one of the biggest indoor facilities in the world and allows even for nitro racing as it uses a high grip asphalt surface! This pack contains 4 extra Welkom Arena tracks!
